name: Wella Kolestint Colour
short_description: Wella Kolestint colors (black 2/0). Amount. 1pc (0.1 pack contains lots of pre-treatment color 15ml, 1 tube of color cream 50 ml 1 bottle of developer cream 50ml, 1 tube of color intense shine treatment (air conditioner) 30ml, 1 pair of gloves, 1 instruction sheet ) MRP. 519 expiration 10/2013 with Kolestint new Wella color that is irresistibly rich, radiant and fresh until colors. Here's how New Wella Kolestint work to keep you glowing with confidence - Pre-color treatment contains almond extract and prepare the hair to absorb the color of the tip of the root. The bright colorful cream is a non-drip formula that envelops the hair for long-lasting, rich color and perfect gray coverage. His revolutionary post-treatment seals intense color shine In your look fresh and colorful, while only moisturizing your hair. Use in place of your regular conditioner every two weeks until you are ready to color again.  http://www.ebay.in/itm/Wella-Kolestint-Colour-Creme-Black-2-0-/130846974819
